Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION

Title: Relates to food service item waste reduction
Summary: Prohibits public food service establishments operating in the state from providing excess food service items including utensils, condiments, napkins and extra containers, to any customer except upon, and in accordance with, the express request of that customer.
LawCode: Add Art 27 Title 34 §§27-3401 - 27-3407, En Con L; amd §92-s, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the state finance law, in relation to food service item waste reduction
